text: Albert Day may refer to: * Albert Day (cricketer) (1865–1908), English cricketer for Yorkshire * Albert Day (English footballer) (1918–1983), professional footballer for Ipswich * Albert R. Day (1861–?), American state legislator from Maine * Albert Day (politician) (1797–1876), American governor of Connecticut * Albert Day (Welsh footballer), Welsh professional footballer for Cardiff * Albert Day (foundry), iron and brass founders in Mark, Somerset Day, Albert
title: Albert Day
